cz.ive.location
Interface MoveAware

All Known Subinterfaces:
Jam
All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyJamImpl, JamImpl, LodManager, ManagerOfSenses
public interface MoveAware

Interface for objects that are interested in being informed about some object movement between locations or for objects that themselves take care about this movement.

Author:
ondra

Method Summary
 void addObject(IveObject object, WayPoint location)
          Method to be called when some object was or is to be added to the given location.
 void expand(WayPoint location)
          Method to be called when some WayPoint becomes non-atomic.
 void moveObject(IveObject object, WayPoint src, WayPoint dest)
          Method to be called when some object was or is to be moved from one location to the other.
 void removeObject(IveObject object, WayPoint location)
          Method to be called when some object was or is to be removed from the given location.
 void shrink(WayPoint location)
          Method to be called when some WayPoint becomes atomic beeing non-atomic before.
 

Method Detail

addObject

void addObject(IveObject object,
               WayPoint location)
Method to be called when some object was or is to be added to the given location.

Parameters:
object - IveObject that is moving
location - destination WayPoint of the movement. This parameter has to have a valid Id but does not necessarily have to be a valid WayPoint.

moveObject

void moveObject(IveObject object,
                WayPoint src,
                WayPoint dest)
Method to be called when some object was or is to be moved from one location to the other.

Parameters:
object - IveObject that is moving
src - source WayPoint of the movement. This parameter has to have a valid Id but does not necessarily have to be a valid WayPoint.
dest - destination WayPoint of the movement. This parameter has to have a valid Id but does not necessarily have to be a valid WayPoint.

removeObject

void removeObject(IveObject object,
                  WayPoint location)
Method to be called when some object was or is to be removed from the given location.

Parameters:
object - IveObject that is moving
location - WayPoint from where the object was or is beeing removed. This parameter has to have a valid Id but does not necessarily have to be a valid WayPoint.

expand

void expand(WayPoint location)
Method to be called when some WayPoint becomes non-atomic.

Parameters:
location - WayPoint beeing expanded

shrink

void shrink(WayPoint location)
Method to be called when some WayPoint becomes atomic beeing non-atomic before.

Parameters:
location - WayPoint beeing shrunk
